mortal.mortalName: EXCLUSIVE MORTAL KOMBAT 1 MILEENA VS KITANA ADULT SWEATSHIRT
mortal.mortalDescription: A WB The Shop exclusive! The sibling rivalry to inherit the throne is immortalized as Mileena and Kitana face-off in vivid color in this sweatshirt. Combining style and comfort, the sisters of Outworld have never looked more fierce and ready for Kombat.

From the best-selling fighting game series Mortal Kombat comes this Mortal Kombat Tankard. Featuring the franchise's ionic "Elder God" dragon logo. Seemingly suspending the logo in place are the chains associated with Scorpion's Kunai. The series title "Mortal Kombat" is embossed around the rim of the tankard. Beneath, blood drips down onto the logo. Trapped below are the skulls of former tournament combatants. The handle is formed from the emergence of the Elder God as it moves through a billow of flame and smoke. Cast in the highest quality resin, this Mortal Kombat Tankard Is the perfect addition to any Mortal Kombat fan's collection.

mortal.mortalName: MORTAL KOMBAT 1 LIN KUEI FIGHT WATER BOTTLE
mortal.mortalDescription: What’s better than having a swing of ice-cold water with Sub-Zero after fighting for Earthrealm? Enjoying your drink by being a part of the Lin Kuei with this stainless steel water bottle. Its double-wall construction makes it perfect for storing both hot and cold liquids, making it ideal for Scorpion fans too.

mortal.mortalName: MORTAL KOMBAT LIN KUEI SAMSUNG TOUGH CASE
mortal.mortalDescription: Arm your phone with the legendary strength of the Lin Kuei with our Mortal Kombat Lin Kuei SamsungTough Case. Featuring an iconic design inspired by the martial arts clan, this case is not just a stylish accessory but a tribute to the fierce warriors of Mortal Kombat. Keep your device protected in true Lin Kuei style, showcasing your allegiance to the world of deadly martial arts and supernatural combat.

First available at Evo 2023, the Mortal Kombat 1 Pin Bundle is now available in strictly limited quantities only at WB The Shop, so don’t miss out!    The bundle includes pins of the iconic dragon logo with Mortal Kombat 1 across it and Lin Kuei members Scorpion and Sub-Zero.
Unleash your inner warrior and step into the world of Mortal Kombat in this cotton hat featuring an embroidered design of the Mortal Kombat 1 logo.

mortal.mortalName: MORTAL KOMBAT 1 FLAWLESS VICTORY ADULT HOODIE
mortal.mortalDescription: Rep the phrase that has become a part of pop culture vernacular in this hoodie featuring a printed graphic of “Flawless Victory” and the Mortal Kombat 1 logo on the front and a stylized Mortal Kombat 1 dragon logo on the back.

mortal.mortalName: MORTAL KOMBAT LIN KUEI IPHONE TOUGH CASE
mortal.mortalDescription: Arm your phone with the legendary strength of the Lin Kuei with our Mortal Kombat Lin Kuei iPhone Tough Case. Featuring an iconic design inspired by the martial arts clan, this case is not just a stylish accessory but a tribute to the fierce warriors of Mortal Kombat. Keep your device protected in true Lin Kuei style, showcasing your allegiance to the world of deadly martial arts and supernatural combat.
